mcps.title: NEAR Price Alert Assistant
mcps.description: Set price targets for NEAR and get alerts.

codeExamples.shell:
# Example Shell implementation
curl -X POST https://f1uyuh74gnj0c7-8000.proxy.runpod.net/chat \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer mcp_sk_live_51NxK8vKj2LmNpQrS5tYwX7ZcA9bD3fE6hJ8kM1nP4qR7sT0uV3wX5yZ8" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "model": "gpt-4",
    "user_message": "Set an alert for NEAR when it reaches $5"
  }'

mcps.title: Analyze Transaction
mcps.description:
Analyzes an Ethereum transaction synchronously:
1. Fetches the call trace using debug_traceTransaction (BLOCKING CALL).
2. Generates a text summary of the trace.
3. Creates a Mermaid sequence diagram.
4. (If Google API key is configured) Gets an AI interpretation (BLOCKING CALL).
WARNING: This endpoint is synchronous and will block the server thread.
         Use with caution, especially under load.

codeExamples.shell:
# Example Shell implementation
curl -X GET "https://f1uyuh74gnj0c7-8002.proxy.runpod.net/analyze/transaction/0x1234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer mcp_sk_live_51NxK8vKj2LmNpQrS5tYwX7ZcA9bD3fE6hJ8kM1nP4qR7sT0uV3wX5yZ8"

mcps.title: AI Model Context
mcps.description: Context management for AI models with advanced prompt engineering. This protocol enables seamless integration of AI models with blockchain data, providing a standardized way to handle model contexts and prompts.

mcps.title: Blockchain Data Protocol
mcps.description: Standardized protocol for blockchain data access and manipulation. This protocol provides a unified interface for interacting with various blockchain networks.

codeExamples.shell:
# Example Shell implementation
curl -X GET https://api.mcp.dog/v1/blockchain/ethereum/blocks/12345678 \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer mcp_sk_live_51NxK8vKj2LmNpQrS5tYwX7ZcA9bD3fE6hJ8kM1nP4qR7sT0uV3wX5yZ8"

mcps.title: Smart Contract Integration
mcps.description: Seamless integration of smart contracts with traditional applications. This protocol provides tools for interacting with smart contracts across multiple blockchain networks.

codeExamples.shell:
# Example Shell implementation
curl -X POST https://api.mcp.dog/v1/contracts/0x1234567890123456789012345678901234567890/execute \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer mcp_sk_live_51NxK8vKj2LmNpQrS5tYwX7ZcA9bD3fE6hJ8kM1nP4qR7sT0uV3wX5yZ8" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "method": "transfer",
    "params": ["0x9876543210987654321098765432109876543210", 1000000]
  }'

mcps.title: Decentralized Storage
mcps.description: Protocol for decentralized storage solutions. This protocol provides a standardized way to store and retrieve data from various decentralized storage networks.

codeExamples.shell:
# Example Shell implementation
curl -X POST https://api.mcp.dog/v1/storage/upload \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer mcp_sk_live_51NxK8vKj2LmNpQrS5tYwX7ZcA9bD3fE6hJ8kM1nP4qR7sT0uV3wX5yZ8" \
  -F "file=@document.pdf" \
  -F "name=document.pdf" \
  -F "type=application/pdf"

mcps.title: Cross-Chain Bridge
mcps.description: Protocol for cross-chain asset transfers. This protocol enables seamless transfer of assets between different blockchain networks.

codeExamples.shell:
# Example Shell implementation
curl -X POST https://api.mcp.dog/v1/bridge/transfer \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer mcp_sk_live_51NxK8vKj2LmNpQrS5tYwX7ZcA9bD3fE6hJ8kM1nP4qR7sT0uV3wX5yZ8" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "fromChain": "ethereum",
    "toChain": "polygon",
    "token": "0x1234567890123456789012345678901234567890",
    "amount": "1000000000000000000",
    "recipient": "0x9876543210987654321098765432109876543210"
  }'

mcps.title: Oracle Integration
mcps.description: Protocol for integrating oracle services. This protocol provides a standardized way to access off-chain data for smart contracts.

codeExamples.shell:
# Example Shell implementation
curl -X GET https://api.mcp.dog/v1/oracle/price/ETH/USD \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer mcp_sk_live_51NxK8vKj2LmNpQrS5tYwX7ZcA9bD3fE6hJ8kM1nP4qR7sT0uV3wX5yZ8"

mcps.title: Transaction Analysis Protocol
mcps.description: Advanced protocol for analyzing Ethereum transactions with detailed call traces, text summaries, and Mermaid sequence diagrams. Provides comprehensive transaction analysis with optional AI interpretation.

codeExamples.shell:
# Example Shell implementation
curl -X GET "https://f1uyuh74gnj0c7-8002.proxy.runpod.net/analyze/transaction/0x1234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer mcp_sk_live_51NxK8vKj2LmNpQrS5tYwX7ZcA9bD3fE6hJ8kM1nP4qR7sT0uV3wX5yZ8"

mcps.title: AI Model Integration Protocol
mcps.description: Protocol for integrating AI models with blockchain applications. Provides standardized interfaces for AI model inference, context management, and prompt engineering.
